# These should NOT be flagged due to context hints

# Example tokens should be suppressed
gitlab_example_token = glpat-ExampleTokenNotRealForTest

# Test tokens should be suppressed
test_npm_token = npm_TestTokenNotRealExample123456789012

# Dummy tokens should be suppressed
dummy_openai_key = sk-DummyKeyForTestingPurposesOnly123456789012

# Example in comments should be suppressed
# Example: sk-abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz1234567890ABCDEFGHIJ

# Sample keys should be suppressed
sample_sendgrid = SG.SampleKeyNotRealTest.SampleSignatureForDocumentation12345678901234

# UUIDs in test files should not be flagged as Heroku keys
test_uuid = 12345678-1234-5678-1234-567890abcdef  # test uuid

# Placeholder values
placeholder_token = glpat-PlaceholderValueNotReal
